history.proof: intros m z t Hinv Hexpo. pose proof (MA0.expo_symm _ _ _ Hinv Hexpo) as Hexpo_symm. destruct Hexpo as [H_exd [i Heq]]. qsimpl time: 1 use: expe_top_ind.

ctx: intros m z t Hinv Hexpo.
pose proof (MA0.expo_symm _ _ _ Hinv Hexpo) as Hexpo_symm.
exceptions.tactic: apply expe_top_ind with (i := i) in Hinv.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable z.

ctx: intros m z t Hinv Hexpo.
pose proof (MA0.expo_symm _ _ _ Hinv Hexpo) as Hexpo_symm.

original: intros m z t Hinv Hexpo. pose proof (MA0.expo_symm _ _ _ Hinv Hexpo) as Hexpo_symm. destruct Hexpo as [H_exd [i Heq]]. apply expe_top_ind with (i := i) in Hinv. unfold exd in H_exd. rewrite <- Heq in Hinv. symmetry. apply Hinv; auto.
